Name: Light Maze
About the game: Gameplay: You will be controlling a cube around multiple levels with varying degrees of difficulty. As you navigate, the tile underneath you will light up and stay lit until you complete the level. Features: Simple controls. Move up, down, left, or right. As a tile lights up, the level gradually illuminates. 100 different levels. Varying levels of difficulty. Save system. Delete it too if you want. Controls: WASD IJKL 8456 or 8426 on the Numpad Arrow Keys This list of controls is accessible in the game. Other Keybinds: P or Escape Key to pause the game. R key to restart the level. Bugs, Issues, Feedback, Suggestions, etc: Whatever it is, please feel free go to the Community Hub Discussion section for this game and ask away.
